trans-unit.source: Provides the look and feel property settings to a designer in a design-time environment.
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Designer themes define the look and feel of a designer.
This includes any background styles, foreground styles, fonts, and icons defined for the designer.
You can create a custom designer theme if you want to provide configuration abilities to properties unique to your designer.
If you do not specify a designer theme for a custom designer, the theme from the base class is used.
Initializes an instance of an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"></xref> that contains the theme information for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> to end with when using a color gradient for the background color.
BackColorEnd indicates the ending color of a background gradient.
To use background gradient color, set the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackColorStart%2A> and BackColorEnd properties.
The background will gradually change color from the starting color to the ending color.
The background ending <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
Gets or sets the starting color of the background when using a color gradient on the background.
BackColorStart indicates the background color, or the beginning color of a background gradient.
To use background gradient color, set the BackColorStart and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackColorEnd%2A> properties.
The background will gradually change color from the start color to the end color.
The background starting <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
Gets or sets the background style.
Use BackgroundStyle to get or set how the background displays color.
The BackgroundStyle can be set to one of four modes: `BackwardDiagonal` Specifies a gradient from upper right to lower left.
`ForwardDiagonal` Specifies a gradient from upper left to lower right.
`Horizontal` Specifies a gradient from left to right.
`Vertical` Specifies a gradient from top to bottom.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientMode"></xref> that describes the background style.
Gets the font for the theme.
BoldFont represents the font to use for highlighted text for the theme.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> of the theme.
Gets or sets the BorderColor for the theme.
The BorderColor is the color used to draw borders for shapes.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the BorderColor of the theme.
Gets the BorderPen for the theme.
The BorderPen is the pen used to draw borders for shapes.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> that represents the BorderPen of the theme.
Gets or sets the style used for the border.
The BorderStyle is the style of line to draw for borders of shapes.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle"></xref> enumeration that represents the style used for the border.
Gets the width of the border in pixels.
The BorderWidth is the width in pixels for borders of shapes.
The width of the border in pixels.
Gets the geometry of the designer.
DesignerGeometry represents the default geometry of shapes for the theme.
`Rectangle` Draws shapes with squared corners.
`RoundedRectangle` Draws shapes with rounded corners.
An enumeration that describes the geometry of the designer.
Gets the image associated with the designer.
The DesignerImage is the default image to display for the designer.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to display for the designer.
Gets or sets the image path for the designer.
The DesignerImagePath is the path to the image file to use as the default image to display for the designer.
The image path for the designer.
Releases the unmanaged resources and optionally releases the managed resources used by <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"></xref>.
When `disposing` is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> references.
This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
Gets the font of the text used by the theme.
`Font` is used to display text in the designer.
The `Font` property determines the font to use for regular text displayed in the designer.
The font of the designer theme.
Gets or sets the color of the foreground.
Use the ForeColor property to specify the foreground color of the theme.
The foreground color is usually the color of the text.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the foreground color of the theme.
Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> object associated with the theme.
Assigning this property causes the brush associated with the theme to draw filled lines and curves.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> object associated with the theme.
Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> used for painting the foreground of the theme.
The <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> is used to draw a line of a specified width and style.
The line drawn by a `Pen` object can be filled in a variety of fill styles, including solid colors and textures.
The fill style depends on which brush or texture used as the fill object.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> that is used to paint the foreground of the theme.
Gets a brush used to paint the area specified by the rectangle passed.
The background brush is used to fill the interior of the background of the designer.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the location and size of the area on the background.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that is used to fill interiors of graphical shapes such as rectangles, ellipses, pies, polygons, and paths.
Gets the size of the image of the theme.
The ImageSize is the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> of the default image used by the theme for the designer.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the size of the image.
Initializes the designer theme.
Initializes the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> with the ambient theme.
Called to signal changes to ambient settings.
OnAmbientPropertyChanged is used to notify the theme to apply changes to ambient properties.
The property that has changed.
Gets the size of the designer.
The size property represents the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> of the designer.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the size of the designer.
